dcterms:creator: S. Kiritchenko
S. M. Mohammad
dcterms:description: A lexicon dataset that includes 3207 phrases with related sentiment scores, where each phrase contains at most 4 words. The sentiment value of a phrase ranges from -1 to 1, with negative meanings assigned negative values and positive meanings assigned positive values.
dcterms:title: SCL-NMA (Sentiment Composition Lexicon for Negators, Models, and Degree Adverbs)

dcterms:creator: A. Go
R. Bhayani
L. Huang
dcterms:description: A labeled dataset used for sentiment classification, specifically designed for Twitter sentiment analysis using distant supervision.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Dataset

dcterms:description: Comments collected from the Facebook pages of BBCNews, CNN, and FoxNews, used as an experimental dataset to analyze flaming events.
dcterms:title: Comments from BBCNews, CNN, and FoxNews Facebook pages

dcterms:description: A labeled dataset generated using an enhanced lexicon-based approach for training a deep neural network model for sentiment classification.
dcterms:title: Labeled dataset for training the deep NN model
